sentences.en: ...instruments that are suspended on cables.
sentences.cn: …悬挂在电缆上的仪器。

sentences.en: A lamp was suspended from the ceiling.
sentences.cn: 一盏吊灯悬在天花板上。

sentences.en: A short leg " boot " cast is used to suspend the lower leg.
sentences.cn: 用小腿上打短的 “ 靴状 ” 管型来悬吊小腿.

sentences.en: Balloons suspend easily in the air.
sentences.cn: 气球容易浮在空中.

sentences.en: Because of you, I had to suspend two of my best agents!
sentences.cn: 因为你们我不得不,让我的两个最好的侦探停职!

sentences.en: Both sides in the conflict have agreed temporarily to suspend hostilities.
sentences.cn: 冲突双方同意暂时停火.

sentences.en: Congress has authorized the president to suspend the operation of a statute.
sentences.cn: 国会已授权总统暂停一项法令的实施.

sentences.en: Each had enough decorum to suspend further hostilities.
sentences.cn: 双方都还有足够的礼貌,总算暂时停止了进一步的敌对行为.

sentences.en: He overstepped the mark and we had no option but to suspend him.
sentences.cn: 他的行为越矩了，我们别无选择只好将他停职。

sentences.en: He was compelled by illness to suspend his experiment.
sentences.cn: 他因病不得不暂时中断实验.

sentences.en: I request them to suspend their decision until they have read my narrative.
sentences.cn: 我请求他们没看完我写的故事之前,别轻率地先下断语.

sentences.en: I'm afraid our school will have to suspend classes tomorrow, though. "
sentences.cn: 不过明天学堂大概要停课了, ” 觉慧不在意地说.

sentences.en: Let us suspend judgement until we know all the facts.
sentences.cn: 让我们在了解全部事实之前暂时不要作出判断.

sentences.en: Malaysia's top law enforcement official praised the decision to suspend the ruling.
sentences.cn: 马来西亚执法官员对撤销这项裁定表示赞同.

sentences.en: Sales of the drug will be suspended until more tests are completed.
sentences.cn: 这种药品在完成进一步检验之前将暂停销售。

sentences.en: Such fine particles suspend readily in water.
sentences.cn: 这种微粒极易悬浮在水中.

sentences.en: Talks between the two countries have now been suspended.
sentences.cn: 两国间的对话现已中止。

sentences.en: The introduction of the new system has been suspended until next year.
sentences.cn: 新制度推迟到明年再行实施。

sentences.en: The parliament has voted by an overwhelming majority to suspend its declaration of independence.
sentences.cn: 议会以压倒性的多数票决定推迟宣布独立。

sentences.en: We had no alternative but halt [ suspend ] the project at the time.
sentences.cn: 当时不下马不行.

words.tran_cn: 悬浮的；暂停的，缓期的（宣判）
悬疑的；令人紧张的；焦急不安的
暂停的；悬而不决的；可疑的；暧昧的
悬吊的；暂时中止的；支持的
悬念；悬疑；焦虑；悬而不决
[植] 胚柄；囊柄；悬带；吊绷带

phrases.tran_cn: 暂时让自己相信虚构的事物（尤指为了欣赏虚构的小说）
（公司因破产或资金不足而）停止付款

trans.tran_en: to attach something to a high place so that it hangs down

trans.tran_cn: 暂停， 终止； 吊， 悬
trans.tran_en: to officially stop something from continuing, especially for a short time
